page.title: 17VILLAGE LIFE, COLD ASHTON.
page.content: The residents of the small village of Cold Ashton share most{events}with the supportive neighbours of Marshfield, donating the financial proceeds to the Church and various charities. The annual{gymkhana,}held on a reident's property, is very popular. However due to the poor summer it had to be cancelled this year. The innovation of the Sheep Dog Trials proved very successful. Great interest is shown in{auctions and the occasional sale in aid of church funds, presided over free of charge by a resident, who is an auctioneer.Harvest Suppers, Jumble Sales,fortnightly whist clubs, Parish Council meetings and Women's Institute all use the Cold Ashton{Church Hall, centrally sited in the village.
